entities.description: Liquids, sprays, and gases that people sniff or inhale to get high or to feel good.
The act of inhaling amyl nitrate, 'poppers', locker room deodorizers, or 'rush' for kicks or to get high.
The act of inhaling correction fluid, degreaser, or cleaning fluid for kicks or to get high.
The act of inhaling gasoline or lighter fluid for kicks or to get high.
Status of whether the respondent has ever inhaled specific substances (yes, no, logically assigned, bad data, never used inhalants, don't know, refused).

relationships.description: Relates substance use to various types of inhalants.
Inhalants category includes the inhalation of amyl nitrate, 'poppers', locker room deodorizers, or 'rush'.
Inhalants category includes the inhalation of correction fluid, degreaser, or cleaning fluid.
Inhalants category includes the inhalation of gasoline or lighter fluid.
Defines the status of whether the respondent has ever inhaled specific substances.
